Posts.Content: Mar 24, 2008 10:07AM JaneyB72 wrote: I know this is late responding, but I absolutely had this problem.  My RadOnc said it was "unfortunate", but does happen. It was completely gross - peeling, bleeding, smelly.  A few weeks later, though, and I showed up with an infection of the expander on that side.  My PS & infectious disease guy think the underarm splits allowed the infection inside.  Keep an eye on the area, and good luck!
Posts.Title: underarm peeling sallyk Ting11
